1: I drink from the life-giving source that refreshes my soul
2: I seek the living presence and draw near
3: Keep steadfast trust in divine presence day and night.
4: I wholeheartedly join others in joyful praise and celebration.
5: I hope and praise receiving help from a kind presence.
6: I remember the divine wherever I am, and my spirit lifts.
7: Deep calls to deep; waves lift and strengthen.
8: Love guides my days; song and prayer sustain my nights.
9: I turn to steadfast support and walk in strength and comfort.
10: I keep hope and stand strong each day
11: I hope in God and praise; my face glows with health.
